group_1.narration: "Add tomato puree, garlic,@and apple spices... pour port wine..."

group_1.textRight: Oh, but I can't be seen by anyone other than@a Magical Girl so...
Even if I take a seat, it'll look like it's vacant...
So I hope it won't be a problem...?

group_1.textLeft: Ahaha, that's alright Sana.
Today, my father is out on a chef-style business trip.
We're not even open today.
But, it's alright for you to come in since you're an@acquaintance of mine.
'Course it is, it'll be fine...
Even though the restaurant's reputation has risen...
My father, the owner and head chef, only works@outside.
So it does get a bit lonely since we're only open for@business once a week.

group_1.textRight: B-but someday...it'll be filled with customers...!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I'm not as pessimistic as I used to be.
I'm spreading the flavors of "Walnut's" to all kinds@of people.
Sooner or later, this place is going to be full of@customers!

group_1.textRight: I have a ton of respect for Manaka...!

group_1.textLeft: Hmm? What is it...?

group_1.textRight: Is that chef's coat new by any chance...?

group_1.textLeft: As expected of Sana!@Did you notice it just now?!
That's right!@That's totally right!
Actually my dad gave me this chef outfit@as a present!
And the reason I called you here today...
...has something to do with that too!
Yup.
Even though I'm going to be a five-star chef one day,@I'm still just a rookie.
That's why, every time I buy a new chef's uniform...
I get a new recipe to learn!
I know, I know~
Sana's a lucky person...
...because you'll be the first one to eat my latest@creation.

group_1.textRight: I-is it... that is...@Will that be ok...?

group_1.textLeft: Of course it is!
It was Sana who taught me not to be so concerned@about these things.
So once again, thank you!
[chara:300902:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Ehhh?@Wh-why are you crying!

group_1.textRight: I'm so happy... !@I'm sorry... it's just so... it's...

group_1.textLeft: No, I just wondered if I said something wrong...
Not at all...
In that case, let's shed more tears of joy!
Yup!
My latest dish.
It's a rare braised hamburger stew!!
Huh?

group_1.textRight: Your chef's clothes, they're already stained with@sauce...!

group_1.textLeft: Don't worry about it.
A chef's clothes are a sign of their growth.
A dirty chef's coat is a testament of hard work.
